20110119000825.000|20110119000826.000|CC1|>> WE SPOKE TO PEOPLE WHO

20110119000832.000|20110119000839.000|CC1|OKAY.                           
20110119000839.000|20110119000840.000|CC1|CORRECT, WE'RE GOING TO GO      
20110119000840.000|20110119000842.000|CC1|BACK THIS EVENING TALK WITH     
20110119000842.000|20110119000844.000|CC1|THE STAFF WHO WERE ON THE       
20110119000844.000|20110119000845.000|CC1|THE SCHOOL.                     
20110119000845.000|20110119000847.000|CC1|WE WANT TO LOOK AT OUR          
20110119000847.000|20110119000848.000|CC1|DISTRICT POLICIES ON THIS       
20110119000848.000|20110119000850.000|CC1|SECURITY MEASURE, WE WANT TO    
20110119000850.000|20110119000852.000|CC1|DETERMINE IF WE NEED TO MAKE    
20110119000852.000|20110119000855.000|CC1|ADJUSTMENTS AS WELL AS          
20110119000855.000|20110119000857.000|CC1|SUPPORT THE TEACHERS AND        
20110119000857.000|20110119000901.000|CC1|STUDENTS OF THE SCHOOL          
20110119000901.000|20110119000909.000|CC1|TOMORROW:                       
20110119000909.000|20110119000913.000|CC1|SHE IS A REMARKABLE             
20110119000913.000|20110119000915.000|CC1|PERSON AND SHAKEN.              
20110119000915.000|20110119000917.000|CC1|I WALKED INTO A CLASSROOM, I    
20110119000917.000|20110119000919.000|CC1|SAW THE CLASSROOM.              
20110119000919.000|20110119000922.000|CC1|AND IT IS A VERY TRAUMATIC,     
20110119000922.000|20110119000922.000|CC1|VIN.                            
20110119000922.000|20110119000924.000|CC1|WE'RE PROVIDING THE TEACHER     
20110119000924.000|20110119000925.000|CC1|THE SUPPORT LIKE STUDENTS.      
20110119000925.000|20110119000927.000|CC1|>> YOU HAVE A LOT OF ANGRY      
20110119000927.000|20110119000929.000|CC1|PARENTS AT HOME SAYING THEY     
20110119000929.000|20110119000931.000|CC1|WERE NOT NOTIFIED.              
20110119000931.000|20110119000943.000|CC1|HOW CAN YOU REASSURE THEM?      
20110119000943.000|20110119000948.000|CC1|>> SO, YOU TALK ABOUT           
20110119000948.000|20110119000949.000|CC1|NOTIFICATION PROCESS.           
20110119000949.000|20110119000950.000|CC1|>> Reporter: ONE, A GUN WAS     
20110119000950.000|20110119000951.000|CC1|ALLOWED ON CAMPUS.              
20110119000951.000|20110119000953.000|CC1|>> WE DON'T ALLOW A GUN TO      
20110119000953.000|20110119000955.000|CC1|COME TO CAMPUS, THE STUDENT     
20110119000955.000|20110119000956.000|CC1|VIOLATED LAW, AND RULES AND     
20110119000956.000|20110119000958.000|CC1|CRIMINAL SYSTEM BY BRINGING     
20110119000958.000|20110119001000.000|CC1|A GUN ON CAMPUS, WE HAVE A      
20110119001000.000|20110119001001.000|CC1|POLICY THAT WILL DETERMINE      
20110119001001.000|20110119001003.000|CC1|WHETHER IT NEEDS TO BE          
20110119001003.000|20110119001004.000|CC1|CHANGED OR AUGMENTED, AS FAR    
20110119001004.000|20110119001006.000|CC1|AS NOTIFICATION WE USE          
20110119001006.000|20110119001007.000|CC1|PROCESS WE HAVE IN OUR          
20110119001007.000|20110119001009.000|CC1|SCHOOL SYSTEM, AND TWO PARTS    
20110119001009.000|20110119001012.000|CC1|ONE IS, IF IT NEEDS TO BE       
20110119001012.000|20110119001014.000|CC1|IMPROVED WE'LL DO, THAT AND     
20110119001014.000|20110119001015.000|CC1|PARENTS NEED TO MAKE SURE WE    
20110119001015.000|20110119001018.000|CC1|HAVE THE CORRECT CONTACT

20110119001019.000|20110119001020.000|CC1|>> FURTHER WITH THAT,           
20110119001020.000|20110119001022.000|CC1|ANYWAY, YOU CAN'T CHECK         
20110119001022.000|20110119001025.000|CC1|3,000 STUDENTS.                 
20110119001025.000|20110119001027.000|CC1|YOU CAN'T DO THAT, BUT WHAT     
20110119001027.000|20110119001029.000|CC1|YOU CAN DO, HAVE YOU THOUGHT

20110119001033.000|20110119001035.000|CC1|MY MIND AS I HAVE BEEN
